subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cliff Lee reached a low point in his career last season when he was left off of the Indians’ postseason roster. But after an off-season spent working on his mechanics, he is 6-0 with a 0.67 E.R.A.
snippet: Cliff Lee reached a low point in his career last season when he was left off of the Indians’ postseason roster. But after an off-season spent working on his mechanics, he is 6-0 with a 0.67 E.R.A.
